document_data.name: ''The Graceful Cloth''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Graceful Cloth''''' was a type of [[enchanted]] [[monk]]'s garb from [[Port Nyanzaru]] in [[Chult]].
document_data.Powers: ''The Graceful Cloth'' was enchanted to constantly bestow ''[[cat's grace]]'' onto its wearer, and it possessed the ''nimble as a cat'' magic that made the wearer's reaction quicker and more nimble and boosted their jumping distance.
document_data.History: Sometime before the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], ''The Graceful Cloth'' was worn by [[Roahton Mobar]], one of the monks of the port city of [[Nyanzaru]], who fought against the [[Headless Serpent, Secret Venom]] gang. The cloth later found its way into the hands of Lady [[Esther]], an adventurer in service of the [[Society of Brilliance]] of [[Baldur's Gate]].
